raw_body: SELLATHAMBOO – JOSEPH EMMANUEL RAJENDRA (Solicitor), passed away peacefully in Sydney, Australia on 27 September 2023. Darling husband of Christine Vasanthy (ANZ Sydney), treasured father of Mary Joanne (Solicitor Dentons Sydney), beloved son of late Xavier Mark Sellathambu (former Member of Parliament, Mullaitivu, Sri Lanka) and of late Mary Josephine, devoted son-in-law of Christie Moses and of late Teresa, loving brother of late Mahendran and Indranee, brother-in-law of Manjula, Leslie, Suresh and Premila, much loved uncle of Xavier, Sandra, Amanda, Jeremy, Marcius and Jordan. Viewing commencing from 8 a.m. followed by Requiem Mass 9.30 a.m. on Saturday, 30 September 2023 at Mary Mother of Mercy Chapel, Barnet Ave, Rookwood Catholic Cemetery NSW Australia. 061696
